title: New honor system
body:
I played from the new honor system realesed and i didnt get any fragments but i got honored many times, my friend gets fragments and me not..
Can anybody help me 
TY

replies.body:
I think if you get Honored And get More than A-, Then you will be able to get key fragments, idk.
It should be something like that.

Both mastery scores and whether you get honored have zero impact on whether you'll get key fragments. It's a long term system so we didn't want anyone to sweat the details so we've tried to make it as simple as possible: Play games, avoid penalties like chat restrictions or suspensions, and you'll get stuff. That's it.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Rewards drop intermittently in the updated Honor system. Drops and timing will be different for each individual, so as long as you're still playing games and not getting penalized, they'll come along eventually
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
